item.title: US-16 East Truck/SD-79 North at I-90/US-14
item.description: US-16 East Truck/SD-79 North at I-90/US-14 (Exit 61). Use I-90/US-14 West/SD-79 North to Gillette (Wyoming). Use I-90/US-14 East to Sioux Falls. SD-79 North joins I-90/US-14 West to Sturgis. This is the eastern end of US-16 Truck.

item.title: US-16 Truck East/SD-79 North Approaching SD-44
item.description: US-16 Truck East/SD-79 North approaching SD-44 to Rapid City.

item.title: US-16 Truck East at SD-79
item.description: US-16 Truck East at SD-79 in Rapid City. SD-79 North joins US-16 Truck East to I-90.

item.title: US-16 Truck East Approaching SD-79
item.description: US-16 Truck East approaching SD-79 in Rapid City.

item.title: US-16 East Approaching US-16 Truck
item.description: US-16 East Approaching US-16 Truck in Rapid City. Use either US-16 or US-16 Truck for access to I-90.
